comments:
Driver : 3.1M6
Platform : WindowsXP sp2 Japanese, Windows2003 Japanese
JVM : IBM JVM 1.4.2 SR1a

steps
1. open 3 files by a Java editor or text editor
2. select close all from the Context menu

result
following error is shown in .log. 3.0.2 doesn't have this error.
